title: Prime Location! Gorgeous Apt Home! Hurry! - SPACIOUS APARTMENT
posting_body: 7600 Manchester Ave, Playa Del Rey, CA, 90293
Use the link below for more details:
Playa Pacifica Apartments in Playa Del Rey
This is a 1 Bedroom + 1 Den, 1 Bath, approximately 850 Sq.
Welcome to a world of serenity & comfort at Playa Pacifica located in beautiful Playa Del Rey.
The Mediterranean-style pool and deck provide a peaceful refuge for those who wish to relax.
Playa Pacifica also offers a full range of activities, including tennis courts, fitness center, sauna, and residents' lounge featuring a flat-screen television and billiards.
Working professionals and students will appreciate the convenience of the business center and the conference room.
Our newly-renovated apartment homes provide deluxe living; shaker style wood cabinets, designer granite or quartz counter tops and vinyl plank flooring make Playa Pacifica the ideal choice for you.
Pricing and availability are subject to change.
Please contact our leasing office for current pricing and specials.
- Business Center W/ Wi-Fi and Conference Room
Photos displayed are a representation of the community but may not be of the exact apartment.
Availability and rental rates are updated daily, and conditions are subject to change without notice.
Please contact the property for current availability and pricing.
